title: description
David Guetta & Akon's Variation Bitch: A sexy mix between the Vodka Sling Variation and the Atlantic. As same as David Guetta & Akon's thing.

title: notes
David Guetta & Akon's Variation Bitch: Sugar, Water and a hint of nothing.

title: pairing
David Guetta & Akon's Variation Bitch: David Guetta & Akon have it with a slow Roast Lamb and shortcake.

title: serving_suggestion
David Guetta & Akon's Variation Bitch: Serve in a highball glass (9.0 oz). Drink to the slow sounds of Sexy Bitch.
